articles.description: Thomas Tuchel says anyone unhappy with Jude Bellingham's on-field attitude - including his mother - do not know the "special boy".
articles.title: Thomas Tuchel: England manager understands how Jude Bellingham's on-field attitude can cause 'mixed emotions'

articles.description: South Africa fast bowler Kagiso Rabada joins an elite Lord's club of two, thanks to a five-wicket haul in the World Test Championship final.
articles.title: Kagiso Rabada: South Africa fast bowler joins elite Lord's club of two

articles.description: The eighth hole at the US Open at Oakmont this week - the longest par three in major championship history - has been described as "silly" and "ridiculous".
articles.title: US Open: 301-yard eighth is longest par three in major championship history

articles.description: Manchester City confirm the signing of AC Milan midfielder Tijjani Reijnders for an initial fee of £46.5m.
articles.title: Manchester City confirm £46.5m signing of AC Milan midfielder Tijjani Reijnders

articles.description: Australia starJoseph-Aukuso Suaalii says he is close to full fitness after a jaw operation raised doubts over whether he would be available to face the Lions this summer.
articles.title: Joseph-Aukuso Suaalii: I'll be fit for British and Irish Lions tour

articles.description: Dave Ryding, Britain's most successful alpine ski racer, is to retire at the end of the 2025-26 season.
articles.title: Dave Ryding: British skier to retire after 2025-26 season and Winter Olympics

articles.description: As Australia and South Africa contest the World Test Championship final, BBC Sport addresses the longer format’s future financial viability.
articles.title: Test cricket: Is longest format financially viable?

articles.description: Female tennis players who wish to freeze eggs or embryos, so they can start a family at a later date, will have their ranking protected by the WTA Tour.
articles.title: WTA tennis players to get ranking protection after freezing eggs

articles.description: Spain's record goalscorer Jenni Hermoso is left out of their squad for the upcoming European Championships.
articles.title: Euro 2025: Record scorer Jenni Hermoso left out of Spain squad

articles.description: Lando Norris tells BBC Sport why being "a great team-mate" helps keep the harmony within McLaren and discusses the challenge of racing against Max Verstappen.
articles.title: Lando Norris on racing against Max Verstappen, Oscar Piastri and finding it hard to say he is 'the best'
